content:
Overview

Scratch is a free, open-source, block-based coding tool that allows programmers to create interactive games, artworks, and other kinds of media in their web browser. Check out the resources below if you're interested in using Scratch in your classroom!

If Scratch is not available in your school, check out CS First, a free curriculum with a safe Scratch editor built-in!
